hook.text: Demosthenes had a speech impediment. He practiced with pebbles in his mouth.

buildup.text: He became Athens' greatest orator despite his struggle.

discovery.text: Demosthenes proved passion and practice overcome natural disadvantages.

twist.text: His speeches against Philip of Macedon shaped politics for decades.

climax.text: You don't need a perfect voice to have a powerful impact.

punchline.text: Practice beats talent. Passion beats perfection.
